@Scape-JAVA wrote:

For a color system to actually work in your server, you need to do a tutorial or write your own code client sided, I believe if you search it up on Google you’ll find some results.

item.title: Colorful Yell System
item.dc:creator: @soccerjunki21 soccerjunki21
item.description:
@soccerjunki21 wrote:

easy man

it should look like

@blue@[owner]@/blue@

if that doesn’t work then remove the @/blue@

item.title: Colorful Yell System
item.dc:creator: @RascalScape RascalScape
item.description:
@RascalScape wrote:

NOTE: the tutorial on this didnt work for my DELTA source

i have a yell command that has your rights before your name
example: [Owner] Punkzombie
I want the [Owner] part colorful
how and where would i place the @blu and other colors?

My servers coding

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
String titles = “”;

            if (playerRights == 1) {
                titles = "[Moderator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 2) {
                titles = "[Administrator] ";
            }
            if (playerRights == 3) {
                titles = "[Owner] ";
            }[/code]

Thank anybody that helps me with this…

Read full topic
